channel.title: Surah Inshrah on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Surah Inshrah on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Tafseer of Surah Inshrah
item.description: Note: this is our 13th post in our series on Tafseer of Juz ‘Amma. Stand up and do more. Muslims don’t retire or quit from working for the deen. Persist. Be like the flower that springs through concrete. Allah says, in verse 3: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ Translation: And raised high for you your repute. If you see those polls on CNN and BBC and all those places, “Who is the most famous person in the world?
